dict.string: ShootSchedule uses your location to show nearby shooting events and help you find shoots in your area.
ShootSchedule uses your location to show nearby shooting events and help you find shoots in your area.
ShootSchedule needs access to your calendars to sync marked shoots. We can add events to your existing calendars (like Google Calendar) or create a dedicated ShootSchedule calendar.
ShootSchedule needs calendar access to sync your marked shoots as calendar events.
